title: Android app deals of the day: Siege of Dragonspear, Zenge, AntVentor, more
content:
Thursday’s most notable price drops on Android games and apps are now ready to go. Today’s offer on Acer’s latest Chromebook Spin 713 and the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 3 5G headline today’s hardware offers, but for now it’s on to the apps. Our collection features price drops on Siege of Dragonspear, Zenge, AntVentor, Passwords-Manager-Pro, and more. Everything is waiting for you down below the fold. 

more…
